commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basa88d6ce"

diff --git a/tools/release/configs/fx-moz18-bootstrap.cfg b/tools/release/configs/fx-moz18-bootstrap.cfg

--- a/tools/release/configs/fx-moz18-bootstrap.cfg

 win32_l10n_buildPlatform   = WINNT_5.2_Depend
 from            = bootstrap@mozilla.org
 to              = build@mozilla.org
-cc              = rhelmer@mozilla.org
+cc              = rhelmer@mozilla.com
